string.name: name
string.value: Long and Dangerous Road of an Agent
You lost the Parachute Agent Shoes that Gaga gave to you recently. You feel bad asking for another pair now, but you probably should.
Gaga seemed overly touched by the encouragement you gave in passing. He is going to give you another pair of Parachute Agent Shoes. Talk to #bGaga#k again.
Gaga gave you a new pair of Parachute Agent Shoes without any conditions. You feel bad for doubting him all this time...
역시 저를 다시 찾아 오실 줄 알았어요. 이놈의 인기란. 후후훗! #L0#맞아요. 가가씨는 얼굴도 잘생긴데다가 노래도 잘부르고 춤도 잘추는 메이플 월드 최고의 요원이에요.(아휴; 신발 받기 힘드네..)#l
역시 #b#h0##k님은 뭘 좀 아시는군요.. 그런데 제가 보기엔 아무래도 낙하산 요원신발이 필요해서 저를 찾아 오신 것 같은데요?
그렇죠? 후훗. 신발이 어딘가 있을텐데.. 제가 좀 찾아 볼테니잠시 후에 다시 말을 걸어주세요.
당신에게 꼭 필요한 낙하산 요원 신발을 다시 드릴 수도 있는데…

I knew you would come back to see me. I'm just that popular... Haha!\r\n#b#L0#You're right. Gaga, you're not only handsome but you can also sing and dance so well. You're definitely the best agent in Maple World. (Geez. So much work just for some shoes...)#l#k
#b#h0##k, I completely agree! But, I feel like you're here because you need the Parachute Agent Shoes... Am I right?
I should have them somewhere... Why don't you talk to me in a little bit while I go look for them?
I could give you the Parachute Agent Shoes...
These are my last pair so make sure you don't lose them.
